files.patch:
@@ -57,1 +57,1 @@ - * @return The Java thread ID, or {@code -1} if doesn't exist + * @return the OS thread ID, or {@code -1} if doesn't exist @@ -89,0 +89,2 @@ + * + * @see java.lang.Thread#threadId() @@ -100,1 +102,4 @@ - * {@code java.lang.Thread.getId()} + * {@code java.lang.Thread.threadId()}. + *

+ * See {@link #getOSThreadId()} for the ID that is returned by + * the operating system.
